Text: Alcohol IS more dangerous and maybe one day they will forbid the use of alcohol, who knows!?

They already tried forbidding alchohol... Prohibition, anyone?

That didn't go down too well. Bootleggers, gangs, etc. etc...
Therefore making prohibition just like the U.S. war on drugs (are we seeing a pattern yet?, look at amsterdams crime rate and compare it to areas in the U.S.)

sooo yeah theres lots of gang activity and widespread use just like prohibition, but  i think by that time everyone had already had a beer, not everyone, and probly most people who are againt weed havnt smoked it

It is interesting to learn thatr alcohol prohibition was a smoke screen to ban ethanol for fuel as it was 25 percent of the market and was becoming a threat to the oil industry.  The made everyone believe it was a moral issue.  Quite deceptive!
